mapper.select: set @member_code := #{member_code}; set @period_day := -30; select row_number() over(order by a.reg_date desc) as row_num , case when a.diff_days = 0 then '오늘' when a.diff_days < 7 then concat(cast(a.diff_days as varchar(10)), '일전') when a.diff_days < 30 then concat(CAST( (floor(a.diff_days / 7)) as varchar(10)), '주전') else DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d') end reg_date2 , a.* from ( select 1 as alam_type /*1 배너요청(t_banner_request), 2 bookmark(t_member_bookmark)*/ ,a.request_code as code ,a.banner_code as code2 ,case when a.status = 1 then concat('', c.member_name ,'님','이 배너 공유 요청을 보냈습니다.') when a.status = 4 then concat('', c.member_name ,'님','이 배너 공유 요청을 거절하였습니다.') when a.status = 9 then concat('', c.member_name ,'님','이 배너 공유 요청을 승인하였습니다.') else '' end as title ,b.title as content ,dateDIFF( NOW(), a.update_date ) as diff_days ,a.request_member_code as member_code ,c.member_name ,a.update_date reg_date from t_banner_request a inner join t_banner b on a.banner_code = b.banner_code inner join t_member c on case when a.status = 1 then a.request_member_code else a.approval_member_code end = c.member_code where b.member_code = @member_code and a.update_date > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL @period_day DAY) union all select case when d1.update_date > a.insert_date then 9 else 1 + a.bookmark_type end as alam_type , a.bookmark_code code , case when a.bookmark_type = 1 then a.banner_code else d.localbox_code end as code2 , case when d1.update_date > a.insert_date then concat('', dm.member_name ,'님','의 새로운 배너를 확인해보세요.') else concat('', b.member_name ,'님','이 ', case when a.bookmark_type = 1 then '배너' else '로컬박스' end, '를 북마크에 추가하였습니다.') end as title , case when a.bookmark_type = 1 then c.title else dm.member_name end as content ,dateDIFF( NOW(), a.insert_date ) as diff_days , a.member_code , b.member_name , a.insert_date reg_date from t_member_bookmark a inner join t_member b on a.member_code = b.member_code LEFT join t_banner c on a.banner_code = c.banner_code LEFT join t_localbox d on a.localbox_code = d.localbox_code left join (select localbox_code, max(update_date) as update_date from t_localbox_banner group by localbox_code) d1 on d.localbox_code = d1.localbox_code left join t_member dm on d.member_code = dm.member_code where (a.member_code = @member_code or c.member_code = @member_code or d.member_code = @member_code) and a.insert_date > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL @period_day DAY) ) a limit ${page}, ${pageSize} ;
